paragraphs.body: See a list of users with rollback rights here.
paragraphs.text: See a list of users with rollback rights here.

paragraphs.body: Rollback users are members of the community who have a few additional abilities to help ${link_0} maintain the wiki. They are able to undo bad edits with one click, by using the rollback link on diff pages and user contributions list. On this wiki, they are also able to edit and delete fanon and blog comments under the conditions established by our ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: Rollback users are members of the community who have a few additional abilities to help administrators maintain the wiki. They are able to undo bad edits with one click, by using the rollback link on diff pages and user contributions list. On this wiki, they are also able to edit and delete fanon and blog comments under the conditions established by our discussion policy.

paragraphs.body: As a side effect of being able to delete comments, rollback users also have the technical ability to delete other pages as well. In addition to the expected task of deleting comments, rollback users may delete:
paragraphs.text: As a side effect of being able to delete comments, rollback users also have the technical ability to delete other pages as well. In addition to the expected task of deleting comments, rollback users may delete:

paragraphs.body: Rollback must not delete pages in any other situation, even if the page should clearly be deleted under the ${link_0}. Instead, the {{delete}} template should be added and action left to an administrator.
paragraphs.text: Rollback must not delete pages in any other situation, even if the page should clearly be deleted under the deletion policy. Instead, the {{delete}} template should be added and action left to an administrator.

paragraphs.body: In addition to following all relevant behavioral policies, rollback users must not:
paragraphs.text: In addition to following all relevant behavioral policies, rollback users must not:

paragraphs.body: These guidelines are assumed to apply equally to administrators.
paragraphs.text: These guidelines are assumed to apply equally to administrators.

paragraphs.body: If it is believed that privileges are being abused by a rollback user, the following process should be applied.
paragraphs.text: If it is believed that privileges are being abused by a rollback user, the following process should be applied.

paragraphs.body: A summary removal of rollback rights does not preclude a user from reapplying for those rights later.
paragraphs.text: A summary removal of rollback rights does not preclude a user from reapplying for those rights later.

paragraphs.body: Rollback users should remain active to assist the wiki, having been entrusted with additional user rights by its community.
paragraphs.text: Rollback users should remain active to assist the wiki, having been entrusted with additional user rights by its community.

paragraphs.body: On Avatar Wiki, users with a strong history of contributions and a history of anti-vandalism work may be granted rollback rights by requesting it at ${link_0}. Rollback rights are a prerequisite for nomination on ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: On Avatar Wiki, users with a strong history of contributions and a history of anti-vandalism work may be granted rollback rights by requesting it at requests for rollback. Rollback rights are a prerequisite for nomination on nominations for adminship.
